home.title: Welcome to Glaciopia
home.subtitle: Glacio Boreale's site - Italian VTuber, content creator and developer of this site.
home.aboutDesc: Italian VTuber, Twitch streamer and creator of this piece of the internet. This site is the headquarters where you can find everything about Glacio and his projects.
home.quickVtpediaDesc: The encyclopedia of VTubers that are part of this community.
home.quickSocialsDesc: Twitch, Youtube, Discord and many more!
home.quickProjectsDesc: Websites, tools and other nerdological stuff built in free time.
home.quickAboutDesc: The story behind Glaciopia and who's on the other side of the screen.

glacio.name: Glacio Boreale
glacio.desc: Italian brainrotten VTuber and creator of this site. He decided to build everything from scratch because he gets bored too easily.

eromo.name: Eromo
eromo.desc: Music producer and romanian translator for Glaciopia. Most of the work was done by an AI, but we put him anyway...

rid.name: its_RID
rid.desc: Editor and humble servant of the illustrious and majestic Lord GlacioBorealeVT. He is paid with 3 goleador per year for his services.

placeholder.desc: The next one could be you! Send an application to be part of the team.

join.title: Join the Team!
join.desc: Want to be part of Glaciopia? Send us an email with your picture, name and description.

vtpedia.title: VTPedia
vtpedia.subtitle: VTuber Encyclopedia
vtpedia.description: Discover the VTubers that have asked to be part of this encyclopedia!
vtpedia.submitSubtitle: Want to be part of VTPedia? Read the requirements and contact us!
vtpedia.rule1: You must be an active VTuber for at least 3 months
vtpedia.rule2: You must have at least one active channel (Twitch, YouTube or similar)
vtpedia.rule3: You must provide at least one image of your avatar/model
vtpedia.rule4: Your content must be suitable for a general audience or clearly indicate age limits
vtpedia.rule5: The request must be sent by the person themselves or with their explicit authorization
vtpedia.rule6: We reserve the right to reject requests without obligation to provide a reason
vtpedia.howDesc: Send an email with the following information:
vtpedia.sponsorDesc: To be included in the VTPedia you must sponsor Glaciopia on your main platform. Choose at least one option:
vtpedia.sponsorTwitchLinkDesc: Add a link to glaciopia.com in your Twitch channel panel
vtpedia.sponsorTwitchCmdDesc: Create a command with this text (replace @yourname with yours):
vtpedia.sponsorTwitchCmdText: Visit glaciopia.com! Home of the infamous VTPedia (of which @yourname is a part)!
vtpedia.sponsorYtLinkDesc: Add glaciopia.com in your channel description or video descriptions
vtpedia.sponsorOtherLinkDesc: Add glaciopia.com in the bio or description of your main platform
vtpedia.sponsorNote: ⚠️ Include in your email which method you chose and on which platform, so we can verify it.
vtpedia.ctaDesc: Are you a VTuber? Apply to join the VTPedia!

fanart.title: Fanart
fanart.subtitle: Gallery
fanart.description: Fanart made by the community and friends!
fanart.noResults: No fanart found for this search.
fanart.submitDesc: Want to send your fanart? Click the button below to open your email client with a pre-filled template. Make sure to attach your image!
fanart.rule1: Images must not exceed 2.5 MB in size.
fanart.rule2: Only send your own original artwork.
fanart.rule4: Accepted formats: JPG, PNG, GIF, WEBP.
fanart.rule5: Include the title of the work and your name/username.
fanart.rule6: Include links to your socials (Twitter/X, Instagram, etc.).

ach.first_visit_desc: You visited Glaciopia for the first time. Welcome!
ach.first_visit_hint: Visit the site for the first time. Even though it unlocks right away...
ach.visited_vtpedia_hint: VTubers here, VTubers there, VTUBERS EVERYWHERE!
ach.visited_fanart_desc: You took a look at the fanart gallery.
ach.visited_socials_desc: You checked where to find Glacio online.
ach.changed_language_hint: Im the cool guy, I speak molte lingue :D
ach.whiteTheme_desc: You got flashbanged by the site, haha.
ach.opened_achievements_desc: You opened the achievements panel. Congratulations on the obvious.
ach.opened_achievements_hint: Open the achievements panel. Even though you'll never see this hint :P
ach.all_pages_desc: You visited all sections of the site.
ach.all_pages_hint: Have you seen everything there is to see?
ach.fourofour_desc: You found the page that doesn't exist, the 404.
ach.mirage_desc: It appeared, like a mirage, only to vanish into thin air.
ach.mirage_hint: There's something odd about the logo...
ach.coin_flip_desc: You found the hidden coin on the 404 page.
ach.coin_flip_hint: I lost my coin on a page lost in time... maybe four letters are enough?
ach.rome_desc: You got back the first face of the coin.
ach.rome_hint: You already found the coin... but which was the right face?
ach.eromo_name: Eromo? What are you doing here?
ach.eromo_desc: Find Eromo by flipping the coin.
ach.eromo_hint: Who is this gorgeous Romanian on my copper coin?
ach.konami_desc: You figured out where to put the legendary code.
ach.konami_hint: Up, up, down, down... ring a bell?
ach.all_achievements_desc: You got all achievements! Congratulations, my brave platinum hunter!

glacio.longDesc: Glacio Boreale is the creator of this beautiful website that is speaking directly to you from a description... Well, I don't know what else to write here.

leo.shortDesc: A pudding-themed VTuber — chill vibes, dry humor, and a competitive streak that comes out of nowhere.
leo.longDesc:
Leo_Tsonus — a pudding-themed VTuber who keeps things chill with a hint of chaos.
I stream a mix of cozy games, multiplayer, and whatever I'm currently obsessed with. Expect relaxed vibes, dry humor, and the occasional competitive streak that comes out of nowhere.
Theme-wise? Yeah, I'm a pudding. Soft aesthetic, caramel top, surprisingly stubborn core.
If you're into low-pressure streams, casual conversation, and a creator who doesn't take himself too seriously, you'll fit right in.
